Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.Map.InfoBubbleAdapter
    As of SDK 3.1.2. Use MapOverlay instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.ResponseListener
    This interface is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use RequestManager.ResponseListener instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager.Listener
    As of SDK 3.2. Use CoreRouter.Listener.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.LaneInfo
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.common.MapActivity
    As of SDK 3.3, replaced by MapFragment.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.LaneInfoListener
    As of SDK 3.2. Use NavigationManager.LaneInformationListener instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.search.ReverseGeocodeRequest
    As of SDK 3.1, replaced by ReverseGeocodeRequest2.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager
    As of SDK 3.2. Use an SDK component which implements the Router interface. For core routing types (Car, Truck, Pedestrian) the appropriate class is CoreRouter. For Public Transit routing the appropriate class is UMRouter.
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.Arrow
    As of SDK 3.2. Use Direction instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.CrossingRestriction
    As of SDK 3.2. Use CrossingRestriction instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.Direction
    As of SDK 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.Marking
    As of SDK 3.2. Use MarkingType instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.Type
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation type methods instead (e.g. LaneInformation.isRegular()).
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.LaneInfo.Directions
    As of SDK 3.2. Use Direction instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.LaneInfo.Position
    As of SDK 3.2. Use RecommendationState instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.LineStyle.LineNameIconShape
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager.Error
    As of SDK 3.2. Use RoutingError.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.here.android.mpa.common.Version.SDK_API_INT
    As of SDK 3.2. Use getSdkVersion() instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.DynamicPenalty.addAreaPenalty(GeoPolygon, int)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use DynamicPenalty.addBannedArea(GeoPolygon). The penalty has no effect. Any area added is blocked from the routing calculation.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.addLaneInfoListener(WeakReference)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use addLaneInformationListener(WeakReference) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RoutePlan.addWaypoint(GeoCoordinate)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use RoutePlan.addWaypoint(RouteWaypoint) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager.calculateRoute(RoutePlan, RouteManager.Listener)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use CoreRouter#calculateRoute .
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager.cancel()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use Router.cancel().
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.RequestManager.createDepartureBoardRequest(GeoCoordinate, String, ResponseListener)
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use RequestManager.createDepartureBoardRequest(GeoCoordinate, String, ResponseListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.RequestManager.createStationSearchRequest(GeoCoordinate, String, ResponseListener)
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use createStationSearchRequest(GeoCoordinate, String, ResponseListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.RequestManager.createStationSearchRequest(String[], ResponseListener)
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use createStationSearchRequest(Set, ResponseListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.RealTimeInfo.getArrivalTimeAsString()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.getArrows()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation.getDirections() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.getCenterMarking()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation.getCenterMarking() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractRequest.getClient()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.getCrossingRestriction()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation.getCrossingRestriction() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.RealTimeInfo.getDepartureTimeAsString()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.getDirection()
    As of SDK 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.LaneInfo.getDirections()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation.getDirections() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.getDividerMarking()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation.getDividerMarking() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager.getDynamicPenalty()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use CoreRouter.getDynamicPenalty()
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.TrafficNotificationInfo.getEvent()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use TrafficUpdater to retrieve TrafficEvents along the route. For example, TrafficUpdater.getEvents(Route, GetEventsListener).
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.getFromSpeedLimit()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation.getSpeedLimit() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.getHeightRestriction()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation.getHeightRestriction() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractRequest.getHost()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.LineStyle.getIconShape()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractRequest.getLanguage()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractListRequest.getMaximumResults()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.search.Location.getNavigationPosition()
    As of SDK 3.1, replaced by Location.getAccessPoints()
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.LaneInfo.getOnRoutePosition()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation.getRecommendationState() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.StationSearchRequest.getRadius()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.DepartureBoardRequest.getStationCoordinate()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.StationSearchRequest.getStationCoordinate()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.DepartureBoardRequest.getStationId()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.StationSearchRequest.getStationIds()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.StationSearchRequest.getStationName()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.StationSearchRequest.getStationNameMatchingMethod()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.ar.ARController.CameraParams.getSupportedSizes()
    As of SDK 3.2.1 Use ARController.CameraParams.getPreviewSizes() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapRasterTileSource.getTile(int, int, int)
    See MapRasterTileSource.getTileWithError(int, int, int)
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.DepartureBoardRequest.getTime()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractDeparture.getTimeAsString()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.getToSpeedLimit()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation.getSpeedLimit() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager.getTrafficPenaltyMode()
    As of SDK 3.0.1. Use DynamicPenalty.getTrafficPenaltyMode().
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.LineCategory.getTransitType()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use LineCategory.getTransportType() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractRequest.getTransitTypes()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.getTypes()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation type methods instead (e.g. LaneInformation.isRegular()).
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.RoadView.getUseAnimation()
    As of SDK 3.2. Instead use NavigationManager.RoadView.getAnimationEnabled().
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.RoadView.getUseEstimatedPosition()
    As of SDK 3.2, this feature will no longer be supported.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RoutePlan.getWaypointAt(int)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use RoutePlan.getWaypoint(int) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.EnhancedRoadLane.getWidth()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use LaneInformation.getWidth() instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapMarker.hideInfoBubble()
    As of SDK 3.1.2. Use MapOverlay instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RoutePlan.insertWaypoint(GeoCoordinate, int)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use RoutePlan.insertWaypoint(RouteWaypoint, int) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager.isBusy()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use Router.isBusy().
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.DepartureBoardRequest.isRealTimeInfoReturned()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.StationSearchRequest.isStationDetailsReturned()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.DepartureBoardRequest.isStrict()
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager.Listener.onCalculateRouteFinished(RouteManager.Error, List)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use CoreRouter.Listener.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.LaneInfoListener.onEnhancedLaneInfo(List)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use NavigationManager.LaneInformationListener.onLaneInformation(List, RoadElement) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.LaneInfoListener.onHideLaneInfo(List)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use NavigationManager.LaneInformationListener.onLaneInformation(List, RoadElement) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager.Listener.onProgress(int)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use CoreRouter.Listener.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.LaneInfoListener.onShowLaneInfo(List, GeoCoordinate)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use NavigationManager.LaneInformationListener.onLaneInformation(List, RoadElement) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.DynamicPenalty.removeAreaPenalty(GeoPolygon)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use DynamicPenalty.removeBannedArea(GeoPolygon).
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.removeLaneInfoListener(NavigationManager.LaneInfoListener)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use removeLaneInformationListener(LaneInformationListener) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager.setDynamicPenalty(DynamicPenalty)
    As of SDK 3.2. Use CoreRouter.setDynamicPenalty(DynamicPenalty)
    com.here.android.mpa.search.Request.setForceOffline(boolean)
    As of SDK 2.1, this method has no affect. The connectivity mode of MapEngine (which can be controlled using MapEngine#setOnline(boolean)) will dictate the mode used when the Request is invoked.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.Map.setInfoBubbleAdapter(Map.InfoBubbleAdapter)
    As of SDK 3.1.2. Use MapOverlay instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractRequest.setLanguage(String)
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.StationSearchRequest.setRadius(float)
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use StationSearchRequest.setRadius(int) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.DepartureBoardRequest.setRealTimeInfoReturned(boolean)
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use DepartureBoardRequest.setRequestRealTimeInfoEnabled(boolean) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.StationSearchRequest.setStationDetailsReturned(boolean)
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use StationSearchRequest.setRequestStationDetailsEnabled(boolean) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.DepartureBoardRequest.setStrict(boolean)
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use DepartureBoardRequest.setStrictResultEnabled(boolean) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager.setTrafficPenaltyMode(Route.TrafficPenaltyMode)
    As of SDK 3.0.1. Use DynamicPenalty.setTrafficPenaltyMode(Route.TrafficPenaltyMode)
    com.here.android.mpa.urbanmobility.AbstractRequest.setTransitTypes(List)
    This method is deprecated since release 3.2. Please use AbstractRequest.setTransportTypes(List) instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.RoadView.setUseAnimation(boolean)
    As of SDK 3.2. Instead use NavigationManager.RoadView.setAnimationEnabled(boolean).
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.RoadView.setUseEstimatedPosition(boolean)
    As of SDK 3.2, this feature will no longer be supported.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapMarker.showInfoBubble()
    As of SDK 3.1.2. Use MapOverlay instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteManager()
    As of SDK 3.2. Use an SDK component which implements the Router interface. For core routing types (Car, Truck, Pedestrian) the appropriate class is CoreRouter. For Public Transit routing the appropriate class is UMRouter.
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.Route.TrafficPenaltyMode.AVOID_CONGESTION
    As of SDK 3.0.1 Use Route.TrafficPenaltyMode.OPTIMAL instead.
    com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapRoute.RenderType.CUSTOM
    As of SDK 3.2. This enum value is no longer used.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteOptions.Type.ECONOMIC
    Since 3.2.
    com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteOptions.TransportMode.PUBLIC_TRANSPORT
    As of SDK 3.2. Use UMRouter with UMRouteOptions.
